text: Psalm 62
Confidence in God’s Salvation
For the \add music\add* director, on Jeduthun.\f + \fr Ps 62 \ft One of David’s musicians (\xt 1 Chr 16:41 \ft ) \f*
A psalm of David.\f + \fr Ps 62 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm; the English verse number is reduced by one \f*
Only for God my soul \add waits in\add* silence.
From him \add is\add* my salvation.
Only he \add is\add* my rock and my salvation,
my \add high\add* stronghold; I shall not be greatly shaken.
How long will you attack a man?
All of you will be shattered\f + \fr 62:3 \ft Or “All of you shatter \fq him \ft ” \f*
like a leaning wall, a tottering fence.
They only\f + \fr 62:4 \ft This word appears first in the Hebrew verse. \f* plan to thrust \add him\add* down from his high position;
they are pleased \add with\add* deception.
With their mouths\f + \fr 62:4 \ft Hebrew “his mouth” \f* they bless,
but ⸤inwardly⸥\f + \fr 62:4 \ft Literally “in the midst of them” \f* they curse. \qs Selah\qs*
Only for God wait in silence, O my soul,
because my hope \add is\add* from him.
Only he \add is\add* my rock and my salvation,
my \add high\add* stronghold; I shall not be shaken.
On God \add rests\add* my salvation and my glory;
God\f + \fr 62:7 \ft Or “In God” \f* is my strong rock, my refuge.
Trust him at all times, O people;
pour out before him your heart.
God \add is\add* a refuge for us. \qs Selah\qs*
Only a vapor\f + \fr 62:9 \ft Or “breath” \f* \add are\add* men of low degree,
a deception \add are\add* men of high degree.
⸤Weighed⸥\f + \fr 62:9 \ft Literally “To go up” \f* in a balance,
together they \add are lighter\add* than a vapor.
Do not trust in extortion,
and do not put vain \add confidence\add* in robbery.
If wealth increases,
do not set \add your\add* heart \add on it\add*.
Once God has spoken;
twice I have heard this:
that strength \add belongs\add* to God.
And to you \add belongs\add* loyal love, O Lord,
because you will render to each according to his work.
